title: Community Wisdom-Based Social Learning Design: Enhancing Language Competencies for Professional Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational understanding of regional culture
context.additional_context: Practitioners in medical/legal/technical fields learning linguistic characteristics of local wisdom, conducting self-directed inquiry using personal devices in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze regionally rooted texts (folktales, proverbs, traditional records) to explain cultural contexts.
Learners can identify and apply at least three social meanings of regional linguistic expressions to professional practice.
Learners can enhance collaborative skills by developing role-play scenarios based on regional wisdom cases.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
